#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
        char aa[1000];
cin>>aa;
int a[1000];
long long kk;
cin>>kk;
int i=0;
long long sum=0;
int b[64];
int n=0;
while(aa[n]!='\0'){
    if(aa[n]=='1')
        a[n]=1;
    else
    a[n]=0;
n++;
}
n--;
/*for(int i=0;i<1000-n;i++){
    a[i]=0;
}*/
//for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
    //cout<<a[i];
//cout<<"\n";
//int r=strlen()
/*while(a[i]!='\0'){
        if(a[i]=='1'){
                //cout<<a[i]<<"\n";
    sum=sum*2+1;
        }
else{
        //cout<<a[i]<<"\n";
    sum=sum*2;
}
    i++;
}*/
//cout<<sum;
//char b[1000];
i=0;
//sum+=k;
while(kk>0){
    b[i]=kk%2;
    kk/=2;
    i++;
 }
 i--;
 /*for(int r=i;r<1000;r++)
    b[i]=0;
*/
 //for(int r=i;r>=0;r--)
   // cout<<b[r];

 //cout<<"\n";
 char c[1001];
 int carry=0,k=0;
 if(n>=i){
for(int j=0;j<=i;j++){
        c[k]='0'+(b[j]^a[n-j]^carry);
    if((a[n-j]==1&&b[j]==1)||(a[n-j]==1&&carry==1)||(b[j]==1&&carry==1)){
        carry=1;
        //cout<<"carry";
    }
    else
        carry=0;
    k++;
}
for(int ii=n-i-1;ii>=0;ii--){
    c[k]='0'+(a[ii]^carry);
    if((a[ii]==1&&carry==1)){
        carry=1;
//cout<<"carry";
 }
 else
    carry=0;
 k++;

}
 if(carry==1){
    c[k]='0'+1;
 k++;
 }
 }
else{




for(int j=n;j>=0;j--){
        c[k]='0'+(b[n-j]^a[j]^carry);
    if((a[j]==1&&b[n-j]==1)||(a[j]==1&&carry==1)||(b[n-j]==1&&carry==1)){
        carry=1;
        //cout<<"carry";
    }
    else
        carry=0;
    k++;
}
for(int ii=n+1;ii<=i;ii++){
    c[k]='0'+(b[ii]^carry);
    if((b[ii]==1&&carry==1)){
        carry=1;
//cout<<"carry";
 }
 else
    carry=0;
 k++;

}
 if(carry==1){
    c[k]='0'+1;
 k++;
 }




}
for(int ii=k-1;ii>=0;ii--)
    cout<<c[ii];

cout<<"\n";
}
}
